name: The Governor
description:
Rebuild your city and fight against the enemies with new style turn-based combat mechanics.
Increase your reputation and rule your land with fear or justice.
Decide carefully, even your people can turn against you! Every action has a reaction.
There is no best gun or skill! Be smart and use your skills wisely in tactical combat to reach success.
Lots of items and Skills.
Improvise, adapt, overcome and became the Governor...
